head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths HUCKO, NATHALIE I.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths HUCKO, NATHALIE I.

block.p: HUCKO-Nathalie I., 92, died October 17, in New York City. Survived by daughters Lois (Roland) Worthington and Grace Hucko; two granddaughters, Marjorie (Christopher Wixson) and Valerie Worthington. Viewing at CookeKennedy, 117 W. 72nd St., Saturday, October 21, 2-8PM. Services, St. John's Lutheran Church, Bloomfield, NJ, Sunday, 2:00PM. Transportation to services provided by family by pre-arrangement.
